course_description: Newton's laws, energy, momentum, angular momentum, conservation laws, many-particle systems, oscillations, planetary motion and Kepler's laws, Lagrange's and Hamiltonian formalisms, non-inertial reference frames, rotation and tensor of inertia, non-linear dynamics and chaos.
prerequisites: (PHYS 142 or PHYS_OX 142 or PHYS 152 or PHYS_OX 152) as prerequisite and (PHYS 220 or MATH 212 or MATH_OX 212) as co-requisite or equivalent transfer credit.
schedule_location: MW 1pm-2:15pm in Math & Science Center - N306
sections: Class Nbr: 2105, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 1-2:15p, Instructor: M. Kim, Status: Open
